name: Solar Games - Coursera Specialization - Assessment 1
description:
Solar 3D

Solar 3D is a piece of software, created by the instructors of a Coursera Specialization to showcase the working of Unity!

The zip file contains all build files for a windows installation

Unfortunate, I was unable to create a WEBGL version nor a MAC version due to errors receiving during build process and unable to solve the issue this far.
